name: Yuki Hirasawa
title: Web Engineer
works_and_service_intro_1: I am an early-career freelance web engineer.
works_and_service_intro_2: Focusing on multilingual websites and user experience design, I aim to build websites that are easy to understand and simple to navigate.
works_and_service_intro_3: 'Bringing your imagination to life' — I carefully shape clients' ideas while keeping that spirit in mind.
about_bio: I work as a freelance systems engineer. I focus on web front-end design and implementation.
about_bg_1: Originally I worked outside the IT industry, primarily in customer service, operations, and coordinating with overseas teams. Since changing course, I have been writing code daily as an early-career web engineer.
about_bg_2: I work around three pillars: clear copy, intuitive user flows, and comfortable usability.
about_bg_3: I enjoy writing code, but I equally enjoy the process of putting a client's image into words and organizing ideas.
about_bg_4: My aim is not to finish and leave — I strive to create work we can grow together.
service_ux_desc: UI and navigation design for multilingual sites.
service_review_desc: We check translation consistency and terminology.
service_navigation_desc: Support for clear global navigation design.
service_translation_desc: Help improve translation quality of technical documents.
project_1_desc: A simple fortune-telling web app built as a practice project.
project_2_desc: A browser-based implementation of the Othello/Reversi board game.
project_3_desc: A landing page / demo for a property project showcasing layout and localization.
project_4_desc: A small task management app demonstrating state and persistence.
project_5_desc: A quiz application built with React.
home_intro: I design and implement user-friendly, multilingual front-ends.
home_additional: I began studying programming in 2024 and continue to hone my skills and update my knowledge daily. Drawing on extensive overseas experience, I bring a global perspective and imaginative approach with the motto 'Bringing your image and ideas to life.' I work closely with each client to provide optimal solutions tailored to individual needs.
about_career_intro: A brief summary of my professional background and focus.
about_2010: In 2010, I discovered the joy of foreign languages during junior and senior high school.
about_2020: Graduated from Kansai Gaidai University in 2020 and joined a five-star hotel in Osaka.
about_2023: In 2023 I gained experience working at a BPO in Malaysia.
about_2024: In 2024, while still employed, I began freelancing alongside my company role.
about_2025: In 2025 I decided to resign and focus full-time on programming.
